【Long-resistant & Easy to Clean】This small animal harness is made of soft mesh fabric, which is durable& washable.The harness can be hand-washed or wiped clean in seconds.

short_description: Appropriate Size: The rabbit harness and leash set is enlarged in size and has a wide application range. Bunnies harness and leash is suitable for rabbits with a chest circumference of 11-14 inches and a weight of 6-9 pounds. The length of the rabbit harness is 59 inches, which ensures enough activity space and is convenient for you to control the pet's activity scope

Scope of Application: The rabbit harness and leash set is specially designed for small pets, suitable for rabbits, Guinea pigs, chinchillas, hamsters, rats and other pets of various sizes, so that your pets can enjoy the freedom when they are outdoors

Soft and Comfortable: The bunnies harness and leash is made of soft, light and breathable good-quality fabric to ensure that the pet feels comfortable when wearing. The mesh design wrapped on both sides not only increases the breathability of the rabbit harness, but also makes the bunnies harness and leash long lasting, and can maintain a good shape even when the pet is active

Reflective Strip Design: The rabbit harness and leash set is designed with a fully covered reflective strip, which can reflect the ambient light at night or in the case of insufficient light. No matter in the morning or evening, the reflective strip can help you easily identify the pet's position and ensure the safety of the pet at any time

Dual Non-Slip Design: The bunnies leash adopts hook and loop and sturdy double buckle design, which effectively avoids pets from slipping off the rabbit harness. The hook and loop design allows users to adjust the tightness of the rabbit harness and leash set according to the pet's body shape, providing a comfortable wearing experience for pets

name: Rabbit Harness and Leash - Adjustable Bunny Harness Escape Proof for Walking Running Hiking Camping Outdoor - Yellow Carrot Pattern Cute Small Animal Harness Leash Set
short_description: This rabbit harness can be adjustabed, suits for small, medium and large rabbits. Neck girth:6.3"-9.8", chest girth:7.8"-13.7", and the length of the bunny leash is 5FT. As each rabbit has its own unique body size, please measure your rabbit's neck and chest size before purchasing to make sure the harness will fit.

Soft Rabbit Harness: The bunny harness and leash are made of nylon, which is wear-resistant and sturdy, soft to the touch and lightweight. There is no pressure after the bunny wears it, and it will not scratch the bunny's skin even if it is worn for a long time.

The rabbit harness and leash are printed with a cute carrot pattern, not only that, but there is also a plush "carrot" on the back of the rabbit harness, which makes the rabbit look more cute after wearing it, and it is a great choice for rabbit dressing.

Outdoor Walking More Secure: The neck and chest of the rabbit harness are made of safety buckles, which can be quickly closed and kept firmly, and can be opened only by manual operation, so as to prevent the rabbit from accidentally getting lost during the walk. Not just for daily walks, but also for outdoor activities such as running, hiking, camping, etc.. Let's create beautiful memories with your sweety bunny.

Wearing Steps: 1. First adjust the rabbit harness to a size larger than the pet's body; 2. Fasten the safety buckles on the neck and chest in turn; 3. Adjust the size of the rabbit harness to leave a finger space between the rabbit and the harness . Note: If the rabbit is wearing a harness for the first time, you can let the rabbit get used to the harness indoors, make sure the rabbit has adapted to the harness, and then fasten the leash and go out together.
